Test Name: White Faced Hornet Venom-specific IgE, Serum
Purpose: To detect and quantify White Faced Hornet venom-specific IgE in serum for allergy assessment.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Automated immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Siemens Immulite or Phadia ImmunoCAP)
